channel.title: Run Server Problem
channel.description:
Everytime i try to runserver i get this
Server: ./HybridScape/npc.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/npcdrops.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/autospawn.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/item.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/drops.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/shops.cfg: file not found. Server: Starting HybridScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
but those files are in there? wat is wrong with it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 09:08:47 am[/size][hr]and i get this messsage when i compile it.
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Run Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

it is it keeps sayin javac is not a recognized internal or external “something” with batch files.

And I downloaded Java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 09:28:20 am[/size][hr]it also says when i compile allstar scape that i dont have jave 5.0 or 6.0 when i downloaded it last night…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 09:47:32 am[/size][hr]will anyone help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Make Sure the Runserver.bat is in the correct place and set your variables

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

this is all the compiler is saying

@echo off
color a
title Compiler
javac *.java
pause

and this is all the runserver.bat is saying

@echo off
color 0a
title Pksc4p3 v2
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

open up your files and make sure that the batch files(when editing) saying jdk1.6_xx
xx=your jdk verizon
